abstract: “It was a night when children were given the floor to bestow accolades on Hollywood,” Jacques Steinberg reports. “At the 21st annual Kids’ Choice Awards on Saturday, Miley Cyrus, the star of the Disney Channel series ‘Hannah Montana,’ was chosen favorite television actress and female singer, while ‘Drake and Josh,’ a Nickelodeon series, was honored as favorite television show with one of its stars, Drake Bell, as favorite television actor.”
lead_paragraph: “It was a night when children were given the floor to bestow accolades on Hollywood,” Jacques Steinberg reports. “At the 21st annual Kids’ Choice Awards on Saturday, Miley Cyrus, the star of the Disney Channel series ‘Hannah Montana,’ was chosen favorite television actress and female singer, while ‘Drake and Josh,’ a Nickelodeon series, was honored as favorite television show with one of its stars, Drake Bell, as favorite television actor.”

headline.main: The Kids Choice: ‘Hannah Montana’ and ‘Drake and Josh’
